pr_title: #354 Use genSrc/android to let the user modify the Android resources

timeline.message: #354 Use genSrc/android to let the user modify the Android resources

timeline.bodyText: Is it really critical for an icon image to exist?
timeline.author: tiainen

replies.bodyText: Yes, aapt package will fail if these icons are not there.
replies.author: jperedadnr

timeline.author: johanvos

replies.bodyText: We use an internal folder gvm/dalvik where the files to create the apk are added. Maybe we should rename this to something different?
replies.author: jperedadnr

replies.bodyText: yes, this has nothing to do with dalvik (the only dalvik-relevant part we have is where the Activity and related ancient Java files are)
replies.author: johanvos

replies.bodyText: OK, filed #359 for that. Any suggestion? apk?
replies.author: jperedadnr

replies.bodyText: in this part of the code, since we're referring to the Android Manifest path, I think androidManifestPath is the best name.
replies.author: johanvos

timeline.bodyText: This block can be moved to a separate method.
timeline.author: tiainen
tiainen

replies.bodyText: No, I've removed that extra assets folder. In fact you can have android/res and android/assets folders (the latter will have to be included in the package command too)
replies.author: jperedadnr

replies.bodyText: With that in mind, the latter will then have a default in substrate as /native/android/assets/assets? Or is this not really mandatory for the default case?
replies.author: tiainen

replies.bodyText: Yes, we don't need that for the default case.
replies.author: jperedadnr

timeline.bodyText: What does this directory resolve to, relative to the root directory?
timeline.author: tiainen

replies.bodyText: OK, sounds a bit strange to use sourceOS as variable name. targetOS sounds more clear?
replies.author: tiainen

replies.bodyText: source comes from src, and OS is for the targetOS, like android or ios(We use the same in utils/ios/InfoPlist).
replies.author: jperedadnr
tiainen

timeline.author: johanvos

replies.bodyText: AndroidManifest is at src/android, icons at src/android/res
replies.author: jperedadnr
